## ClashManager.fetchTeam() method

Fetch a team participating in a tournament by the team ID.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
fetchTeam(teamId: string): Promise<TournamentTeam>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  teamId | string | The ID of the team. |

<b>Returns:</b>
